Package ca.phon.app

Root package for phon application.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    VersionTrigger
    Actions performed when the application version changes.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BootHook
    Setup appliation environment using resource files found in the META-INF folder.
    BootWindow  
    IPADictionaryInitHook  
    JxBrowserStartupHook
    Startup hook for JxBrowser library
    Main
    Main entry point for the application.
    ObjectLoaderHook  
    PhonDesktopStartupHook  
    PhonShutdownThread  
    PhonSplasher
    Starts the Phon application along with a fast Phon splash screen.
    ThemeHook
    Sets UI theme
    VersionInfo
    Methods for determining the version number of the application.
    VLCInitHook
